DataElement.preferredName: Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma Histologic Classification Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to a histologic classification of clear cell renal cell carcinoma.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma Histologic Classification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant epithelial neoplasm of the kidney characterized by the presence of lipid-containing clear cells within a vascular network.  The tumor may metastasize to unusual sites and late metastasis is common._Pertaining to the combined microscopic physical features of cells and their surrounding extracellular environment in tissues._A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant epithelial neoplasm of the kidney characterized by the presence of lipid-containing clear cells within a vascular network.  The tumor may metastasize to unusual sites and late metastasis is common.

Concepts.definition: A malignant epithelial neoplasm of the kidney characterized by the presence of lipid-containing clear cells within a vascular network.  The tumor may metastasize to unusual sites and late metastasis is common.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of or relating to histology.:Classification; the grouping of things into classes or categories.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the combined microscopic physical features of cells and their surrounding extracellular environment in tissues.
A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.
